instructions: Enter your email address on the login page and click Next . Select Forgot password? at the bottom of the password page. Choose the Text option if you want to recover your account via text message. If you have an alternative email account set up, you can pick Email instead. If you chose the text message option, enter your phone number and press Submit to receive a code. If you picked the email option, continue to the next step. Locate the verification code from the text or email and enter it on Yahoo's site. Follow any other on-screen prompts.
